LanguageData.VFEV_Feast.label: feast
LanguageData.VFEV_Feast.letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} suggests throwing a feast after the last stockpile check to boost morale. Be warned - Feasts can last up to 48h. Colonists will binge on food and drugs until it is over. Simply draft your colonists to stop them taking part in the feast.
LanguageData.VFEV_Feast.calledOffMessage: The feast has been called off.
